subsection_content:
Intestinal inflammation appears with different symptoms depending on the severity and location of damage. Some typical signs to mention include: (1)
Diarrhea; Tired; Stomach-ache.; Appearance of blood in stool.; Anorexia.; Unusual weight loss.
Rarer symptoms include:
Fever; Itchy, red, sore eyes; Athritis; Nausea and vomiting; Skin rash and sores (ulcers)
Diarrhea and abdominal pain are the two most typical symptoms of intestinal inflammation
